attributes.action: Errection of two Wind Turbines in SA48 8NW
attributes.additional_details:
http://​forms.ceredigion.gov.uk/ufs/​ufsmain?ebz=2_1338891611283

This is a petition to oppose the above planning application for the errection of two wind turbines in SA48 8NW.

Wind turbines are an incredible way of creating energy and in the correct enviroment work effieciently.

BUT I believe the correct infastructure must be in place to errect these structures. Unfortunately the propsed site is 2 miles away from a main road. In an increadable green part of West Wales. The road is used by dog walkers, school buses and horses. There is not enough room for two cars to pass by each other never mind great big lorries, cranes and other machinery needed to errect the Turbines.

I hope you can all support this great cause.

Thank You Very much
